title: Flash Flood
effect_text: Discard 2 Food or destroy 1 Farm on a Plains tile.

title: Root Rot
effect_text: Production of Wood is halved (rounded down) for the next round.

title: Cave-In
effect_text: **Blocked:** Place a "Blocked" token on one Mine. It produces nothing until cleared.

title: Blighted Crops
effect_text: Destroy 1 Farm level 1. If a Level 2+ Farm exists, downgrade it by one level instead.

title: Deep Freeze
effect_text: All players must discard 1 card from their hand immediately.

title: Wildfire
effect_text: Destroy 1 Forester Station. If adjacent to another Forest, spread to that tile unless 2 Food (Water) spent.

title: Tremors
effect_text: All Stone production reduced by 1 per Quarry this round.

title: Drought
effect_text: Food production cost increases: Must spend 1 Wood to harvest Food this round.

title: Pestilence
effect_text: Each player must trash 1 card from their hand or discard 2 cards.

title: Heavy Fog
effect_text: Exploration action costs +1 Resource this round.

title: Kobold Scavengers
effect_text: Lose 3 basic resources of the team's choice. **Fox Walls** prevent this.

title: Siege Engine
effect_text: Destroy one building on the outermost edge of the map. **Fortifications** (Lvl 2+) prevent this.

title: Supply Ambush
effect_text: Players cannot pass cards to neighbors during the next round.

title: Goblin Raiders
effect_text: Steal 1 random card from each player's hand. **Fox Walls** prevent this.

title: Bandit Camp
effect_text: Place a Bandit Token on a random empty hex. Blocks building until cleared (Cost: 3 Resources).

title: Mana Surge
effect_text: All Owl Research costs increase by 1 resource this round.

title: Reality Fracture
effect_text: Lose 2 Insight or move the Storm Track an additional +1 step.

title: The Storm's Eye
effect_text: The Fox player must shuffle 2 "Fear" cards into their deck.

title: Aether Howl
effect_text: **Silence:** No players may communicate verbally during the next Strategy Phase.

title: Aether Feedback
effect_text: Owl player must discard 1 card for every 2 Research cards they have in their tableau.

title: Time Dilation
effect_text: Badgers have -1 Worker this round.

title: Resource Decay
effect_text: All stored Basic Resources are reduced by half (rounded up).

title: Shadow Walkers
effect_text: Hostile Events this round have +1 Severity.

title: Void Whispers
effect_text: Players cannot draw cards from card effects this round.

title: The Darkening
effect_text: Reveal the next 2 events immediately. Resolve them both.

title: Storm Climax
effect_text: **CRITICAL:** If not cancelled by spending 10 Insight, the game ends immediately (Loss).

title: Fear
effect_text: **Unplayable.** Cannot be played for any action. Takes up hand space.
